title: Strengthening Patient Care Competencies: Short-Term Online Training for Enhancing Critical Information Management Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can reduce error rates by 40% by applying a three-step verification framework to evaluate the credibility of digital information sources
Learners can critique claims in news articles with 80% accuracy using mathematical data analysis techniques (statistical distributions, correlation)
Learners write case studies based on a fake news classification system and derive over 90% valid conclusions through peer assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
